concept.title: Repainting an entire house of resale or refreshing the interior design.
concept.shortdesc: Paint is an easy way to refresh a house design. Houses with good interior design sell faster than houses with poor design choices. Start a design scheme by selecting a whole house concept color scheme

conbody.p: The first step to taking on a full house repaint is to measure all of the rooms and make a square footage map
The second step is determining the color scheme that will be used.
The third step is making a materials list and costing out the job
